NK002(kha)020:0: sman bla gtso 'khor gsum gyi sgom bzlas la brten
NK002(kha)020:1: nas bsnyen pa bya tshul sogs nyung gsal kun phan
NK002(kha)020:2: bdun rtsi zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK002(kha)020:3: na mo gu ru b+hee sha dz+ye r+aa dza ya /
NK002(kha)020:4: bcom ldan 'das sman pa'i rgyal po gtso 'khor gsum
NK002(kha)020:5: gyi rnal 'byor la brten nas bsnyen pa bya ba'i
NK002(kha)020:6: tshul ni / 'di nyid kyi rjes gnang dang lung legs par thob cing /
NK002(kha)020:7: khas blangs pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa khrus
NK002(kha)020:8: dang gtsang spra'i kun spyod la gtso bor gnas pa'i
NK002(kha)020:9: sgrub pa pos gnas dben zhing yid dang mthun pa'i
NK002(kha)020:10: bsam gtan gyi khang bur phyag dar byas te /
NK002(kha)020:11: rang gi mdun du sman bla gtso 'khor rnams kyi
NK002(kha)020:12: bris 'bur gyi sku gang rigs bshams pa'i spyan sngar
NK002(kha)020:13: gtor ma dkar zlum che chung gnyis /
NK002(kha)020:15: chu gnyis sngon 'gro'i nyer spyod sogs dgos pa'i yo byad rnams 'du bya /
NK002(kha)020:16: cha gsum btang la mtshams bcad /
NK002(kha)020:17: skyabs 'gro nas bzlas pa'i bar pan chen nam mkha'
NK002(kha)020:18: dpal bzang gis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs ltar nyams su
NK002(kha)020:19: blang / mi pham pa'i gsung sman bla'i mdo chog
NK002(kha)020:20: bdud rtsi'i bum bzang ltar nyams su blangs pas 'thus
NK002(kha)020:22: bzlas pa'i mjug tu spro na /
NK002(kha)020:23: mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas bdag
NK002(kha)020:24: dang sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa dang sgrib
NK002(kha)020:25: pa nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba dang
NK002(kha)020:26: / tshe dang bsod nams ye shes la sogs pa
NK002(kha)020:27: gong nas gong du 'phel zhing rgyas par byin gyis
NK002(kha)020:28: / brlab tu gsol // zhes gsol ba gdab /
NK002(kha)020:29: bdag bskyed kyi ye shes pa mdun gyi nam mkhar
NK002(kha)020:30: byon pa la mchod bstod byas nas 'khor dang gdan
NK002(kha)020:31: rang la thim zhes pa'i bar dkyus ltar la /
NK002(kha)020:34: dge ba 'di yis myur du bdag /
NK002(kha)020:35: sangs rgyas sman bla 'grub gyur nas //
NK002(kha)020:38: 'khor dang gdan rang la thim pa'i rjes su /
NK002(kha)020:39: mchod gtor bsang sbyang byin rlabs dkyus bzhin la /
NK002(kha)020:40: rang gi snying ga nas 'od zer 'phros pas bcom
NK002(kha)020:41: ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa bdun la gzhan yang
NK002(kha)020:42: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' chos
NK002(kha)020:43: skyong ba'i srung ma'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pas
NK002(kha)020:44: bskor ba mdun gyi nam mkhar badz+ra sa m+aa dzahs
NK002(kha)020:46: pad+ma ka ma l+aa ye s+t+wam gyis gdan 'bul /
NK002(kha)020:48: gzhi bdag gtor ma rgyun du ma phul kyang chog /
NK002(kha)020:49: mthar yi ge brgya pa lan gsum /
NK002(kha)020:51: rten yon na brtan bzhugs dang /
NK002(kha)020:52: med pa rnams badz+ra muhs gshegs su gsol /
NK002(kha)020:53: rang gi dpral bar sogs gong bzhin mthar /
NK002(kha)020:55: thun mtshams su grub na mdo lugs kyi phyag mchod rgyas bsdu gang yang rung ba dang /
NK002(kha)020:56: ma grub kyang sman mdo che chung ji ltar rigs pa gdon /
NK002(kha)020:57: de lta bu'i rim pas bsnyen tshad gzungs thung 'bum
NK002(kha)020:58: phrag gcig kha skong dang bcas pa bzla ba yin
NK002(kha)020:59: la / thun so so'i mthar gzungs 'bring po ci nus dang /
NK002(kha)020:65: sap+ta ta th+aa ga ta sa ma d+h+y+aa d+hish+thi te /
NK002(kha)020:69: sarba p+aa pam n+aa sha ya /
NK002(kha)020:73: bud+d+ha k+she tra pa ri sho d+ha ni /
NK002(kha)020:77: sarba a k+aa la mri t+yu ni p+aa ri ni /
NK002(kha)020:78: bud+d+he su bud+d+he bud+d+h+aa d+hi sh+tha na /
NK002(kha)020:80: sarba de b+aa sa me a sa me sa man+t+aa ha ran+tu me /
NK002(kha)020:81: sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sat+wa n+aam /
NK002(kha)020:83: pra sha man+tu me sarba i t+yu pa dra ba b+y+aa d+ha ya /
NK002(kha)020:84: p+au ra ni p+au ra ni /
NK002(kha)020:87: bee d+aur+ya pra ti b+ha se sarba p+aa pam k+sha yam ka ri s+w+aa h+aa /
NK002(kha)020:88: zhes pa'i gzungs ring 'di nyer gcig re la nyung mtha' byas pa bzla ba shin tu gal che /
NK002(kha)020:89: gzhan mtshams kyi skabs spang blang sogs bya rgyud kyi
NK002(kha)020:90: bsnyen pa spyi ltar shes par byas la nyams su
NK002(kha)020:91: blang ngo // de lta 'bad pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
NK002(kha)020:92: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs shing de
NK002(kha)020:93: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba dang
NK002(kha)020:94: / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa dang /
NK002(kha)020:95: tshe yi mthar yang bcom ldan 'khor bcas mngon sum
NK002(kha)020:96: du mthong zhing dag pa'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur
NK002(kha)020:97: ba sogs phan yon mtha' yas par gsungs so //
NK002(kha)020:98: yang rang gzhan la phan gdags pa'i slad du gzungs sgrub byed par 'dod na /
NK002(kha)020:99: mdun du bris sku'i spyan sngar stegs kyi khar bum
NK002(kha)020:100: pa dri bzang gi chus gang ba kha rgyan mgul
NK002(kha)020:101: chings dang bcas pa'i steng du /
NK002(kha)020:102: dung chos mchod yon gyis bkang ba dang /
NK002(kha)020:103: gzungs thag rdo rje bcas bsham /
NK002(kha)020:104: ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa tshar du dngang bas mdzes par bya /
NK002(kha)020:105: bdag gi rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro bas bum pa bsang sbyang /
NK002(kha)020:106: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+aum las rin po che'i bum
NK002(kha)020:107: pa mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i nang
NK002(kha)020:108: du / h+r+aihls pad+ma dang a las zla ba'i dkyil
NK002(kha)020:109: 'khor gyi steng du gzungs sngags kyi phreng ba rang
NK002(kha)020:110: sgra sgrog bzhin pas 'khod par gyur /
NK002(kha)020:112: mdo chog las 'byung ba'i 'phags pa'i tshogs de dag
NK002(kha)020:113: thams cad la mchod yon dang byug pa sogs nas
NK002(kha)020:114: / 'bul lo mchod do zhes pa'i bar gyi mchod /
NK002(kha)020:115: dpal bee d+aur+ya'i gzungs sngags mthu dang nus pa bsam
NK002(kha)020:116: gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa khyed kyi bdag
NK002(kha)020:117: dang bsgrub bya dmigs bsal yod na de'i ming gzhug
NK002(kha)020:118: / sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la tshogs rdzogs shing sgrib pa sbyang ba dang /
NK002(kha)020:119: chos kyi rtogs pa khyad par can skye bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
NK002(kha)020:122: rang gi thugs ka nas sngags kyi phreng ba gzungs
NK002(kha)020:123: thag la brten te song bas dung chos kyi chu
NK002(kha)020:124: la phog / de lud nas bum pa'i nang du
NK002(kha)020:125: lhung ba yig 'bru rnams la thim pa las bdud
NK002(kha)020:126: rtsi'i rgyun dpag tu med pa babs pas bum pa
NK002(kha)020:127: la phog / gang bar gyur / zhes pa'i dmigs
NK002(kha)020:128: pa dang sbyar te gzungs ring gtso bor bzla zhing
NK002(kha)020:129: la phog / gang bar gyur / / thun 'jog pa na mchod pa gong ltar dang /
NK002(kha)020:130: dung chos kyi chu mchod yon du phul te gsol
NK002(kha)020:131: ba gdab pas yig 'bru rnams 'od du ltem gyis
NK002(kha)020:132: zhu ba las bum pa'i chu gzungs sngags kyi nus
NK002(kha)020:133: pa mtha' dag dang ldan par bsam /
NK002(kha)020:134: de ltar thun du bcad nas zhag bdun sogs ji
NK002(kha)020:135: ltar rigs pa bsgrubs pa'i mthar rang nyid kyis bkru
NK002(kha)020:136: ba dang btung ba sogs bya /
NK002(kha)020:137: bsgrub bya gzhan la byed na bkru byabs srung gsum
NK002(kha)020:138: mam bkru ba dang shing brjod rgyas par byas pas
NK002(kha)020:139: nad gdon bar chad thams cad zhi zhing sgrib gnyis
NK002(kha)020:141: tshe bsod dpal 'byor rgyas pa sogs gzungs sngags kyi
NK002(kha)020:142: phan yon ji skad bshad pa rnams 'thob par 'gyur
NK002(kha)020:143: la / gshin po'i rus pa dang dur khrod kyi
NK002(kha)020:144: sa gzhi sogs la 'thor bas dmigs yul gyi ngan
NK002(kha)020:145: song du skye ba'i las kyi sgrib pa byang bas
NK002(kha)020:146: mtshon yon tan mtha' yas shing /
NK002(kha)020:147: tshul de bzhin du bye ma'am /
NK002(kha)020:148: yungs kar sogs la basngagasa nas 'thor bas kyang rung bar gsungs so //
NK002(kha)020:149: zhes pa'ang rang gzhan mang po la phan pa'i bsam
NK002(kha)020:150: pa kho nas yig cha snga ma 'ga' zhig gi
NK002(kha)020:151: don mdor bsdus te sh+aakya'i dge slong bya bral ba
NK002(kha)020:152: many+dzu g+ho shas sbyar ba'i dge bas 'gro kun 'khor
NK002(kha)020:153: ba dang ngan song gi sdug bsngal las grol te
NK002(kha)020:154: byang chub snying po'i go 'phang myur du thob pa'i
